mean_cn: adj. 雄伟的，崇高的，极端的，超群的；  n. 顶峰，崇高；  v. 使…纯化，使…升华，变高尚
mean_en: very beautiful or good :causing strong feelings of admiration or wonder
word_etyma: sub达到 + lime阈值 → sublime 顶点，崇高的
short_phrase: the sublime sunrise over the ocean
sentence: The sublime view brought him a magical feeling of awe.
sentence_trans: 这里的景色太雄伟了，他在敬畏之中着了魔。
